org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.buffer

Class BaseCudaDataBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.api.buffer.BaseDataBuffer
      • org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.buffer.BaseCudaDataBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DataBuffer, JCudaBuffer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CudaDoubleDataBuffer, CudaFloatDataBuffer, CudaIntDataBuffer

    public abstract class BaseCudaDataBuffer
extends BaseDataBuffer
implements JCudaBuffer
    Base class for a data buffer CUDA implementation for DataBuffer always uses JavaCPP as allocationMode, and device access is masked by appropriate allocator mover implementation. Memory allocation/deallocation is strictly handled by allocator, since JavaCPP alloc/dealloc has nothing to do with CUDA. But besides that, host pointers obtained from CUDA are 100% compatible with CPU
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
